dcterms:description: The Story Cloze Test is a natural language understanding task that consists in selecting the right ending for a given short story. The evaluation data consists of a Dev set and a Test set, each containing samples of four sentences of a story, followed by two alternative sentences, from which the system has to select the proper story ending.
dcterms:title: Story Cloze Test

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh
Nathanael Chambers
Xiaodong He
Devi Parikh
Dhruv Batra
Lucy Vanderwende
Pushmeet Kohli
James Allen
dcterms:description: ROC Stories consists of around 100,000 crowd-sourced short five-sentence stories ranging over various topics. These stories do not feature a wrong ending, but with appropriate extensions they can be deployed as training data for the Story Cloze task.
dcterms:title: ROC Stories

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh

Xiaodong He

Dhruv Batra
Lucy Vanderwende
Pushmeet Kohli
James Allen
dcterms:description: The Dev set is a subset of the Story Cloze Test dataset used for development and tuning of models. It contains instances of stories and their corresponding endings.
dcterms:title: Dev set

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh

Xiaodong He
Devi Parikh
Dhruv Batra
Lucy Vanderwende
Pushmeet Kohli
James Allen
dcterms:description: The Test set is a subset of the Story Cloze Test dataset used for evaluating the performance of models. It contains instances of stories and their corresponding endings.
dcterms:title: Test set

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh

dcterms:description: The Dev-Train set is a small training dataset constructed from the Dev set by splitting it randomly into two parts, used for training models.
dcterms:title: Dev-Train set

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh

Xiaodong He

Dhruv Batra

Pushmeet Kohli
James Allen
dcterms:description: The Dev-Dev set is a subset of the Dev set containing 10% of the instances used for validation of models.
dcterms:title: Dev-Dev set
